text: Heidemarie Wieczorek-Zeul (born 21 November 1942) is a German politician. She is a member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). From 1979 until 1987, she was a member of the European Parliament. Between 1998 until 2009, she was Federal Minister of Economic Cooperation and Development.Bundeskanzlerin beruft Rat f√ºr Nachhaltige Entwicklung neu German Council for Sustainable Development (RNE), press release of 26 October 2016 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:MEPs for Germany Category:Politicians from Frankfurt Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Economic Cooperation ministers of Germany
title: Heidemarie Wieczorek-Zeul
